title: How do you shrink/expand the client?
body: I am asking this because I don't know what I did and now the client is super huge and I can't just drag a corner to make it bigger/smaller

replies.body: Morning!  You can scale the client by holding Ctrl and tapping the plus or minus sign.  In this case tapping - will shrink it a bit.  Let me know if that does the trick.  :D
